title: Doom Bots?
body: WHERE THE HELL ARE DOOM BOTS!!?!

replies.body: The Rotating Game Mode (RGM) queue is only active (on Oceania) between 11AM AEST and 3AM AEST Friday through Monday. Since you made this post sometime before 9AM, Doombots is, evidently, not going to be available. As a note, this information is included in the "Queue Schedule" thread that is stickied in the boards (which, logically, would've been your first stop).
